<a name="Area"></a>
## type [Area](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/area.go#L23-L33>)

Area represents an automation composed of an action and one or more reactions

```go
type Area struct {
    ID          uuid.UUID
    UserID      uuid.UUID
    Name        string
    Description *string
    Status      Status
    CreatedAt   time.Time
    UpdatedAt   time.Time
    Action      *Link
    Reactions   []Link
}
```

```go
func (a Area) OwnedBy(userID uuid.UUID) bool
```

OwnedBy reports whether the area belongs to the provided user

func (a Area) WithDescription(description string) Area

<a name="Link"></a>
## type [Link](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/link.go#L22-L31>)

Link binds an AREA to a configured component \(action or reaction\)

```go
type Link struct {
    ID          uuid.UUID
    AreaID      uuid.UUID
    Role        LinkRole
    Position    int
    Config      componentdomain.Config
    RetryPolicy *RetryPolicy
    CreatedAt   time.Time
    UpdatedAt   time.Time
}
```

<a name="Link.IsAction"></a>
### func \(Link\) [IsAction](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/link.go#L34>)

```go
func (l Link) IsAction() bool
```

IsAction reports whether the link represents the AREA trigger

<a name="LinkRole"></a>
## type [LinkRole](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/link.go#L12>)

LinkRole describes how a component participates in an AREA

```go
type LinkRole string
```

<a name="LinkRoleAction"></a>

```go
const (
    // LinkRoleAction identifies the trigger component of an automation
    LinkRoleAction LinkRole = "action"
    // LinkRoleReaction identifies a downstream reaction component
    LinkRoleReaction LinkRole = "reaction"
)
```

<a name="RetryPolicy"></a>
## type [RetryPolicy](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/link.go#L48-L53>)

RetryPolicy captures retry behaviour for a reaction link

```go
type RetryPolicy struct {
    MaxRetries int
    Strategy   RetryStrategy
    BaseDelay  time.Duration
    MaxDelay   time.Duration
}
```

<a name="RetryPolicy.Delay"></a>
### func \(RetryPolicy\) [Delay](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/link.go#L64>)

```go
func (p RetryPolicy) Delay(attempt int) time.Duration
```

Delay returns the backoff duration for the provided attempt number \(1\-indexed\)

<a name="RetryPolicy.ShouldRetry"></a>
### func \(RetryPolicy\) [ShouldRetry](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/link.go#L56>)

```go
func (p RetryPolicy) ShouldRetry(attempt int) bool
```

ShouldRetry reports whether another attempt is allowed after the specified attempt count

<a name="RetryStrategy"></a>
## type [RetryStrategy](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/link.go#L39>)

RetryStrategy enumerates supported retry backoff strategies

```go
type RetryStrategy string
```

<a name="RetryStrategyConstant"></a>

```go
const (
    RetryStrategyConstant    RetryStrategy = "constant"
    RetryStrategyLinear      RetryStrategy = "linear"
    RetryStrategyExponential RetryStrategy = "exponential"
)
```

<a name="Status"></a>
## type [Status](<https://github.com/Epitech-2nd-Year-Projects/AREA/blob/main/server/internal/domain/area/area.go#L11>)

Status mirrors the area\_status enum from the persistence layer

```go
type Status string
```

<a name="StatusEnabled"></a>

```go
const (
    // StatusEnabled indicates the automation is active and should run
    StatusEnabled Status = "enabled"
    // StatusDisabled prevents the automation from executing while retaining configuration
    StatusDisabled Status = "disabled"
    // StatusArchived marks the automation as read-only and hidden from default listings
    StatusArchived Status = "archived"
)
```
